General.Name: Suzhou Hengmingda Electronic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Hengmingda Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the design, research and development, production, and sale of consumer electronic functional devices in China and internationally. The company's principal products are paste and fix, shielding, insulating, buffer, heat dissipation, dustproof, and protection functional devices. It also offers consumer electronic protection products, precision structural parts, precision sheet metal, EMS assembly, automation equipment, and internet of things equipment. Its products are used in mobile phones, computers, smart wearable devices, 5G communication equipment, new energy fields, and other products and their components. Suzhou Hengmingda Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is based in Kunshan, China.
